2: <mistake>d+ama+a</mistake> <mistake>tu</mistake> <mistake>dzwAn</mistake> <mistake>gab+ha</mistake> <mistake>aAHa//sngags</mistake> <mistake>dgod</mistake> <mistake>pa'o //de</mistake> nas dbal ldan rdo rje <mistake>'chang//daga'</mistake> zhing mgu nas thal mo <mistake>sbyar//mgon</mistake> po bcom ldan <mistake>re bzhin</mistake> <mistake>gshegs//rdzogs</mistake> sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
3: <mistake>nas/rnam</mistake> mang mgon po <mistake>gzhan</mistake> rnams <mistake>dang//gsang</mistake> dbang lag <mistake>n</mistake> rdo rje <mistake>de//hrobo'i</mistake> <mistake>gyl</mistake> por bcas rnams <mistake>kyis//gsang</mistake> bstod nas ni tshig 'di <mistake>gsos//mgon</mistake> po bdag cag rjes <mistake>yi</mistake> <mistake>rang //legs</mistake>
4: so legs so legs par <mistake>gsungs//bdag</mistake> cag yang dag rdzogs pa <mistake>yi//byang</mistake> chub thob pa'i don chen <mistake>mdzad// 'gro</mistake> ba mgon med rnams dang <mistake>ni//rnam</mistake> <mistake>prol</mistake> 'bras bu 'tshal ba <mistake>y//rnam</mistake> dag legs
5: pa'i lam 'di <mistake>ni//skyu</mistake> 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan <mistake>pa//zab</mistake> cing yangs la rgya che <mistake>ba// don</mistake> chen 'gro ba'i don byed <mistake>pa//sangs</mistake> rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di <mistake>ni //rdzogs</mistake> pa'i <mistake>sangs</mistake> rgyas kun gyis <mistake>pshadg//</mistake>
6: 'di ni yang <mistake>dg</mistake> par sbro ba nye bar bsdu <mistake>ba'</mistake> tshigs su bcad pa <mistake>lnga'o//'phags</mistake> pa rnal 'byor <mistake>then</mistake> po 'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa <mistake>tingnga</mistake> 'dzin <mistake>draba'i</mistake> <mistake>be'u</mistake> las <mistake>phyang</mistake> <mistake>ba/ btcam</mistake> ldan 'das
7: <mistake>'dam</mistake> <mistake>dbal</mistake> ye shes sems dpa'i don <mistake>dam</mistake> pa'i mtshan yang dag <mistake>par</mistake> brjod <mistake>pa/ bcom</mistake> <mistake>lna na</mistake> 'das de <mistake>bzho</mistake> ne gshegs pa <mistake>shA k</mistake> thub pas <mistake>gsunas</mistake> pa rdzogs <mistake>sto///hun</mistake> <mistake>mon</mistake> dang thun mong ma yin pa'i
8: gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa'i bdag nyid chen po <mistake>zla</mistake> ma dam ba chos kyi rgyal <mistake>bo'i</mistake> bka' drin gyis <mistake>nye</mistake> bar bskyangs <mistake>pa/ sgra</mistake> bsgyur gyi lo <mistake>tse ba</mistake> <mistake>dge</mistake> slong blo gros <mistake>brtan</mistake> <mistake>pas// bsm</mistake> gtan <mistake>glan</mistake>
